text: Eric Alexander Wareheim (; born April 7, 1976) is an American actor, comedian, writer, director, and musician. He is one half of the comedy duo Tim & Eric, alongside Tim Heidecker. They created the television shows Tom Goes to the Mayor, Tim and Eric Awesome Show, Great Job!, Check It Out! with Dr. Steve Brule, Tim and Eric's Bedtime Stories, and Beef House. He had a constant role on the Netflix series Master of None. Wareheim was born in Audubon, Pennsylvania. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American voice actors Category:American television actors Category:American television directors Category:American television writers Category:American television producers Category:Musicians from Pennsylvania Category:Comedians from Pennsylvania Category:Writers from Pennsylvania Category:Actors from Pennsylvania
title: Eric Wareheim
